params._to: The new owner of this contract

params._index: The index of the Function to retrieve

changeOwner(address).notice: This function provides the possibility to change the owner

getFunction(uint256).notice: Get the RatingFunction at a certain index

getIds().notice: Get the list of the names of the stored RatingFunctionFunctions

pushFunction(address,bytes32).notice: Add a new RatingFunction to the registry, only if the caller is the owner of this registry (avoid spam)

userdoc.notice: This contracts stores a list of RatingFunctions. An Item can pick from this registry the function it wants to use to compute its final score
